name: Streaming Gemma-on-Dataflow
description: A flex template configuring a streaming Gemma pipeline using pytorch and pub/sub

parameters.name: messages_subscription
parameters.label: Input messages subscription
parameters.helpText: The pub/sub subscription to pull inputs from

parameters.name: responses_topic
parameters.label: Output messages topic
parameters.helpText: The pub/sub topic to push outputs to

parameters.name: device
parameters.label: Device
parameters.helpText: The device to run inference on. Can be 'CPU' or 'GPU'.
